trans-unit.source: An activity that supports compensation of its child activities.
trans-unit.target: En aktivitet som støtter kompensering av underordnede aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity allows a developer to specify a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> activity that defines a long-running task that performs their core business logic.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity gjør det mulig for utviklere å angi en <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>aktivitet som definerer en oppgave for lang tid som utfører metoder deres kjerner.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also allows the developer to optionally specify a compensation and confirmation activity to schedule appropriate business logic in the event of errors or successful completion of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør også at utvikleren leverer du kan også angi en kompensasjon og bekreftelsen aktivitet for å angi riktig metoder hvis det oppstår feil eller fullføring av <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: Compensation and confirmation of a CompensableActivity is invoked by using the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> returned by the CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Kompensasjon og bekreftelse av en CompensableActivity aktiveres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>returnert av CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is an opaque, typed object returned as the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A> argument after successful completion of a CompensableActivity activity’s <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>returneres objektets ugjennomsiktig, typeangitt som <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A>argument etter fullføring av en CompensableActivity aktiviteten <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A></xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activities to explicitly invoke confirmation and compensation of a CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>brukes av den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>og <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>aktiviteter for å aktivere eksplisitt bekreftelse og godtgjørelsen for en CompensableActivity.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity can be composed in a nested hierarchical fashion in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity kan bestå i nestede hierarkisk helt i arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Compensation Programming Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Kompensasjon Programming modellen](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir aktiviteten som er planlagt når den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> utfører.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er angitt under kjøring en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir for aktiviteten er planlagt når aktiviteten er avbrutt.

trans-unit.source: CancellationHandler can be used to specify custom cancelation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: CancellationHandler kan brukes til å angi egendefinerte annullering logikken for den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>for <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when compensation is performed on the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir for aktiviteten er planlagt når kompensasjon er utført på den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: CompensationHandler kan brukes til å angi egendefinerte kompensasjon logikken for den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>for <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>
